p: Tocopherols are important lipophilic antioxidants, which naturally occur in four isomeric forms (δ-, γ-, α- and β-tocopherols). During the biosynthesis of tocopherols, γ-tocopherol methyltransferase catalyzes the conversion of γ- and δ-tocopherols respectively to α- and β-tocopherols ( Fritsche et al., 2017). In this study, we tried to evaluate the effects of different drying techniques on each tocopherol.
